name: Charles Walter
description: I am Good,gentle,easy going,resourceful,and fun to be around with. i am just a happy person living. i love traveling,watching sport,shooting pool, play board games like chess.and also love listening to news,i like to cook also. my favorite color is white and black.my best days is to hangout on weekends. always busy during the week.i am not a material man but love to look good. i enjoy spending time with my loved once,i hate dishonesty,but like straight and sincere people. feel free to post me a message if there is any interest.
